File /std/room/inherit/room_rental_office.c

A Room Rental Office inheritable by goldenthread started 24 Sep y2k1

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/shops/bank.h, /include/room/room_rental.h and /include/money.h

Method index

add_room(string, int)
This method adds a room into the offices list of rooms to rent.
clear_rooms()
This method removes all the rooms from the offices list of rooms to rent.
delete_room(string)
This method deletes a room from the offices list of rooms to rent.
do_list()
The command to print the list of rooms available to rent.
do_rental(string)
This method attempts to rent a room.
query_domain()
Queries the domain of the current office.
query_list()
This method returns the list of all the rooms available from this office.
query_location()
Queries the location of the current office.
set_domain(string)
Sets the domain of the current office.
set_location(string)
Sets the location of the current office.

Public Functions

These are functions that everyone can access.

.
add_room
int add_room(string room,
int cost)
This method adds a room into the offices list of rooms to rent.

Parameters:
room - the room to add
cost - how much the room costs to rent
Returns:
1 on success, 0 on failure
clear_rooms
int clear_rooms()
This method removes all the rooms from the offices list of rooms to rent. Use this function with caution.

Returns:
1 on success, 0 on failure
delete_room
int delete_room(string room)
This method deletes a room from the offices list of rooms to rent.

Parameters:
room - the room to delete
Returns:
1 on success, 0 on failure
do_list
int do_list()
The command to print the list of rooms available to rent.

do_rental
int do_rental(string room)
This method attempts to rent a room. It checks the return from the handler and prints the appropriate message.

Parameters:
room - the room to try and rent
Returns:
1 on success, 0 on failure
query_domain
string query_domain()
Queries the domain of the current office.

Returns:
the domain of the office.
query_list
string query_list()
This method returns the list of all the rooms available from this office.

Returns:
the string list of rooms
query_location
string query_location()
Queries the location of the current office.

Returns:
the location of the office.
set_domain
void set_domain(string dom)
Sets the domain of the current office.

Parameters:
dom - the domain
set_location
void set_location(string loc)
Sets the location of the current office. This is a name to identify the "hotel" or local group of rooms.

Parameters:
loc - the location
